description: This table stores goal information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: GOAL_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference identifier associated with the goal.

columns.name: GOAL_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the name of the goal.

columns.name: GOAL_DESC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the identifier of the Notes (HNO) record that stores the goal description.

columns.name: GOAL_CREATION_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when the goal was created by the external system.

columns.name: GOAL_RCNT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when the value of the patient's recent progress for the goal was changed by an external system.

columns.name: GOAL_CONTRIBUTOR_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the contributor of the goal.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Provider goal


Patient goal


Negotiated goal

columns.name: GOAL_SRC_DXR_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number of the Received Documents record that owns the instance of this goal.

columns.name: GOAL_RECENT_VALUE
columns.description: This item stores the value of the patient's recent progress for the goal.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Discrete Goals Template (IGT) record IDs that maps to the goal.

columns.name: GOAL_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the last update instant in UTC for the goal.

columns.name: GOAL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the goal type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Diet


Exercise


Weight


Blood Pressure


Result Component


Patient Stated


Contingency


General

columns.name: GOAL_VAL_COMP_YN
columns.description:
This item stores the whether the goal recent value is compliant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: GOAL_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the categorization of the goal. It will be null if the category cannot be determined.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


General


Social Determinants of Health
